This version of Roussimoff Rehabilitation Systems' Morozov-CH backpack has been modified from its original form. Comfortably carry vital gear with the Morozov-CH backpack. This softshell bag is made with an advanced duraweave that's lightweight yet ready for battlefield action. It also features several easy to access pockets and a plethora of straps to keep supplies secure and tight to your back.
